meanings.definition: The state or quality of not being necessary.
meanings.sent1: The nonnecessity of extra toppings on the pizza was clear to everyone.
meanings.sent2: I realized the nonnecessity of bringing an umbrella on a sunny day.
meanings.sent3: His insistence on wearing a winter coat in summer showed a comical nonnecessity.
meanings.sent4: The nonnecessity of a backup plan hit me like a ton of bricks during the crisis.
meanings.sent5: The nonnecessity of a second pair of shoes became apparent after the long hike.

meanings.sent1: She packed her bag with only the essentials, leaving behind any nonnecessity.
meanings.sent2: The purchase of a new phone case was considered a nonnecessity by many.
meanings.sent3: The nonnecessity of a third cup of coffee made him chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Carrying around emotional baggage is a heavy nonnecessity in life.
meanings.sent5: The clutter in her room was a visual reminder of the nonnecessity of excess stuff.
